item.title: Project 2: Web Scraping Ulta Skin Care
item.description: Basic Skin Care routine involve cleansers, moisturizers, sunscreen, serums, toners, essences, and treatments. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project 1: Google Play Store 2018
item.description: Google Play Store consists of numerous applications within varying categories. As a digital distribution service for Android, users have access to a number of family, gaming, and tool apps, to name a few. There are approximately 2.7 million applications available as of February 2017. The 2018 scraped data within this dashboard reveals a sample of the state of the Google Play Store. Further exploration and analysis can be done to determine which categories contain the most or least amount of apps, installations, rating distributions, and more.
